results.title: Twin Peaks
results.brief_description: The body of Laura Palmer is washed up on a beach near the small Washington state town of Twin Peaks. FBI Special Agent Dale Cooper is called in to investigate her strange demise only to uncover a web of mystery.

constellations_other.name: Spooky shadows
constellations_other.description: Hellish and hilarious vampires connect pioneering German cinema to contemporary New Zealand comedy with a quick detour into small town strangeness.

constellations_other.name: Reflecting duality and revealing new realities
constellations_other.description: The Toupie Fantoche relies on four prismatic mirrors to reflect changes in animation states.

results.description: The body of Laura Palmer is washed up on a beach near the small Washington state town of Twin Peaks. FBI Special Agent Dale Cooper is called in to investigate her strange demise only to uncover a web of mystery that ultimately leads him deep into the heart of the surrounding woodland and his very own soul.
description_for_label: The body of Laura Palmer is washed up on a beach near the small Washington state town of Twin Peaks. FBI Special Agent Dale Cooper is called in to investigate her strange demise only to uncover a web of mystery that ultimately leads him deep into the heart of the surrounding woodland and his very own soul.

results.title: Twin Dragons
results.brief_description: Twins, separated at birth, end up as a Hong Kong gangster and a New York concert pianist. When the pianist travels to Hong Kong for a concert, the two inevitably get mistaken for each other.

constellations_other.name: Clones, doubles and doppelgangers
constellations_other.description: Multiple characters and doubles materialise in this Constellation inspired by the pioneering special effects of Georges Méliès.

results.description: Twins, separated at birth, end up as a Hong Kong gangster and a New York concert pianist. When the pianist travels to Hong Kong for a concert, the two inevitably get mistaken for each other.
description_for_label: Twins, separated at birth, end up as a Hong Kong gangster and a New York concert pianist. When the pianist travels to Hong Kong for a concert, the two inevitably get mistaken for each other.

results.title: Twelve Monkeys
results.brief_description: In the year 2035, convict James Cole reluctantly volunteers to be sent back in time to discover the origin of a deadly virus that wiped out nearly all of the earth’s population and forced the survivors into underground communities.

constellations_other.name: There's always a lighthouse
constellations_other.description: The thaumatrope was an early optical illusion device popular in the Victorian era and was important to the development of the moving image.

results.description: In the year 2035, convict James Cole reluctantly volunteers to be sent back in time to discover the origin of a deadly virus that wiped out nearly all of the earth’s population and forced the survivors into underground communities. But when Cole is mistakenly sent to 1990 instead of 1996, he’s arrested and locked up in a mental hospital. There he meets psychiatrist Dr. Kathryn Railly, and patient Jeffrey Goines, the son of a famous virus expert, who may hold the key to the mysterious rogue group, the Army of the 12 Monkeys, thought to be responsible for unleashing the killer disease.
description_for_label: In the year 2035, convict James Cole reluctantly volunteers to be sent back in time to discover the origin of a deadly virus that wiped out nearly all of the earth’s population and forced the survivors into underground communities. But when Cole is mistakenly sent to 1990 instead of 1996, he’s arrested and locked up in a mental hospital. There he meets psychiatrist Dr. Kathryn Railly, and patient Jeffrey Goines, the son of a famous virus expert, who may hold the key to the mysterious rogue group, the Army of the 12 Monkeys, thought to be responsible for unleashing the killer disease.

results.title: Tsotsi
results.creator_credit: Movieworld Productions, Industrial Development Corporation of South Africa, UK Film & TV Production Company, National Film & Video Foundation of South Africa, Gavin Hood, Emilia Roux, Peter Fudakowski, Nadia Kruger and Pierre Vienings
results.brief_description: Tsotsi finds a baby in the back seat of a car that he has just stolen. He decides that it’s his responsibility to take care of the baby and in the process learns that maybe the gangster life isn’t the best way.

constellations_other.name: My People
constellations_other.description: The breakout single for Sydney dance duo The Presets, 'My People' was one of the biggest hits of 2007 and propelled by the engaging music video.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Movieworld Productions, Industrial Development Corporation of South Africa, UK Film & TV Production Company, National Film & Video Foundation of South Africa, Gavin Hood, Emilia Roux, Peter Fudakowski, Nadia Kruger and Pierre Vienings
results.description: The South African multi-award winning film about a young South African boy from the ghetto named Tsotsi, meaning Gangster. Tsotsi, who left home as a child to get away from helpless parents, finds a baby in the back seat of a car that he has just stolen. He decides that it his responsibility to take care of the baby and in the process learns that maybe the gangster life isn’t the best way.
description_for_label: The South African multi-award winning film about a young South African boy from the ghetto named Tsotsi, meaning Gangster. Tsotsi, who left home as a child to get away from helpless parents, finds a baby in the back seat of a car that he has just stolen. He decides that it his responsibility to take care of the baby and in the process learns that maybe the gangster life isn’t the best way.

creators_primary.name: Industrial Development Corporation of South Africa
National Film & Video Foundation of South Africa

results.title: True Romance
results.creator_credit: Samuel Hadida, Roger Avary, Gary Barber, Susan Becker, Benjamín Fernández, Bill Unger, Tony Scott, James W. Skotchdopole, Steve Perry, Quentin Tarantino, Warner Bros. Pictures, August Entertainment, Davis Films and Morgan Creek Productions
results.brief_description: Clarence marries hooker Alabama, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood, while the owners of the coke try to reclaim it.

constellations_other.name: Movies in movies in a movie museum
constellations_other.description: The 400 Porto-Arc 16mm projector used the first electric light ever invented, which was perfectly suited for movie projectors. This Constellation explores the movies where characters go to the movies, by two movie-obsessed directors.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Samuel Hadida, Roger Avary, Gary Barber, Susan Becker, Benjamín Fernández, Bill Unger, Tony Scott, James W. Skotchdopole, Steve Perry, Quentin Tarantino, Warner Bros. Pictures, August Entertainment, Davis Films and Morgan Creek Productions
results.description: Clarence marries hooker Alabama, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood, while the owners of the coke try to reclaim it.
description_for_label: Clarence marries hooker Alabama, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood, while the owners of the coke try to reclaim it.

results.title: True Lies
results.creator_credit: Lightstorm Entertainment, 20th Century Fox, James Cameron, Peter Lamont, Marlene Stewart, Stephanie Austin, Claude Zidi, Simon Michaël and Didier Kaminka
results.brief_description: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.

constellations_other.name: Go Bang
constellations_other.description: Australian dance act PNAU are renowned for groundbreaking visuals in their music videos, including for their 2017 single 'Go Bang' which featured Kira Divine.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Lightstorm Entertainment, 20th Century Fox, James Cameron, Peter Lamont, Marlene Stewart, Stephanie Austin, Claude Zidi, Simon Michaël and Didier Kaminka
results.description: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.
description_for_label: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.

results.title: True History of the Kelly Gang
results.brief_description: True History of the Kelly Gang is a 2019 British-Australian biographical western film based on the exploits of Australia’s famous outlaw, Ned Kelly. It’s directed by Justin Kurzel, from a screenplay by Shaun Grant, based upon the 2000 novel of the same name by Peter Carey.

constellations_primary.name: The Australian industry
constellations_primary.description: Though our local industry is small, our impact is huge!

constellations_primary.name: Alice Babidge and True History of the Kelly Gang
constellations_primary.description: An acclaimed set, costume, and production designer in the world of theatre, Alice Babidge has most recently been working in film including Justin Kurzel features Snowtown and True History Of The Kelly Gang.

constellations_other.name: Pink, Pose, punk, Pilgrim
constellations_other.description: Alice Babidge's costume design for True History of the Kelly Gang sees the iconic foursome and their accomplices in dresses, a gender-expansive stance that connects to other rebellious outlooks on the world.

constellations_other.name: Inspired design and costume sketches
constellations_other.description: Costume designers Edie Kurzer and Alice Babidge have worked on some of the most acclaimed Australian and international films and TV, joining the ranks of fellow Australians creatives.

results.description: Based on Peter Carey’s novel. The story of Australian bush-ranger Ned Kelly and his gang as they flee from authorities during the 1870s.
description_for_label: Based on Peter Carey’s novel. The story of Australian bush-ranger Ned Kelly and his gang as they flee from authorities during the 1870s.

results.title: True Blood
results.brief_description: True Blood is an American television drama series created and produced by Alan Ball. It is based on The Southern Vampire Mysteries series of novels by Charlaine Harris, detailing the co-existence of vampires and humans in Bon Temps, a fictional, small town in northwestern Louisiana. The series centers on the adventures of Sookie Stackhouse, a telepathic waitress with an otherworldly quality.

constellations_other.name: Thomas Edison
constellations_other.description: Thomas Edison helped establish cinema as an art-form and mass entertainment. Many of his early films were short and showed everyday activities like riding a bicycle.

results.description: True Blood is an American television drama series created and produced by Alan Ball. It is based on The Southern Vampire Mysteries series of novels by Charlaine Harris, detailing the co-existence of vampires and humans in Bon Temps, a fictional, small town in northwestern Louisiana. The series centers on the adventures of Sookie Stackhouse, a telepathic waitress with an otherworldly quality.
description_for_label: True Blood is an American television drama series created and produced by Alan Ball. It is based on The Southern Vampire Mysteries series of novels by Charlaine Harris, detailing the co-existence of vampires and humans in Bon Temps, a fictional, small town in northwestern Louisiana. The series centers on the adventures of Sookie Stackhouse, a telepathic waitress with an otherworldly quality.

results.title: TRON: Legacy
results.creator_credit: Revolution Sun Studios, Walt Disney Pictures, LivePlanet, Prana Studios, Sean Bailey Productions, Kontsept Film Company, Steven Lisberger, Jeffrey Silver, Michael Wilkinson, Richard Jefferies, Joseph Kosinski, Sean Bailey, Edward Kitsis, Adam Horowitz and Darren Gilford
results.brief_description: Sam Flynn, the tech-savvy and daring son of Kevin Flynn, investigates his father’s disappearance and is pulled into The Grid. With the help of a mysterious program named Quorra, Sam quests to stop evil dictator Clu from crossing into the real world.

constellations_other.name: VR dreams
constellations_other.description: Since VR's inception creators have explored the ways VR could be used to enhance our lives and even extend them.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Revolution Sun Studios, Walt Disney Pictures, LivePlanet, Prana Studios, Sean Bailey Productions, Kontsept Film Company, Steven Lisberger, Jeffrey Silver, Michael Wilkinson, Richard Jefferies, Joseph Kosinski, Sean Bailey, Edward Kitsis, Adam Horowitz and Darren Gilford
results.description: Sam Flynn, the tech-savvy and daring son of Kevin Flynn, investigates his father’s disappearance and is pulled into The Grid. With the help of a mysterious program named Quorra, Sam quests to stop evil dictator Clu from crossing into the real world.

results.title: Triumph of the Will
results.creator_credit: Leni Riefenstahl-Produktion, Reichspropagandaleitung der NSDAP, Walter Ruttmann, Eberhard Taubert and Leni Riefenstahl
results.brief_description: Filmmaker Leni Riefenstahl’s controversial masterwork is an artful work of propaganda showcasing German chancellor and Nazi Party leader Adolf Hitler at the 1934 Nuremberg Rally. Edited from over 60 hours’ worth of raw footage shot over the course of the rally’s four days, the film is visually remarkable in the way it captures the event’s enormous scale.

constellations_other.name: The war effort on film
constellations_other.description: Newsreel and documentaries were used as propaganda for the war effort by all sides during WWII, many of them made by major film studios, directors and actors.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Leni Riefenstahl-Produktion, Reichspropagandaleitung der NSDAP, Walter Ruttmann, Eberhard Taubert and Leni Riefenstahl
results.description: Filmmaker Leni Riefenstahl’s controversial masterwork is an artful work of propaganda showcasing German chancellor and Nazi Party leader Adolf Hitler at the 1934 Nuremberg Rally. Edited from over 60 hours’ worth of raw footage shot over the course of the rally’s four days, the film is visually remarkable in the way it captures the event’s enormous scale.
